statements: SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT log_id, party_id, log_timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE mediator_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM communication_logs WHERE party_id = 3 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE party_id = 2 AND mediator_id = 4;
SELECT party_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM communication_logs GROUP BY party_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE mediator_id = 1 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, party_id, log_message FROM communication_logs WHERE party_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM communication_logs;
SELECT log_message FROM communication_logs WHERE mediator_id = 3 OR party_id = 4 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM communication_logs WHERE party_id = 1 AND mediator_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM mediator_logs LIMIT 5;
SELECT party_id, communication_date, communication_content FROM party_logs WHERE mediator_id = 3;
SELECT communication_medium, mediator_id, party_id FROM mediator_logs ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM party_logs WHERE communication_medium = 'Email' AND communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT party_id, COUNT(mediator_id) AS num_of_communications FROM party_logs GROUP BY party_id HAVING COUNT(mediator_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM mediator_logs WHERE mediator_id = 1
SELECT communication_date, communication_medium FROM party_logs WHERE party_id = 2 ORDER BY communication_date DESC
SELECT party_id, mediator_id, communication_date FROM mediator_logs WHERE communication_medium = 'Email'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM party_logs
SELECT * FROM party_logs WHERE communication_medium = 'Phone' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM mediators;
SELECT id, name, email FROM mediators WHERE organization IS NULL;
SELECT name, phone FROM mediators WHERE phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM parties_involved ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, role, address FROM parties_involved WHERE role = 'Lawyer';
SELECT * FROM mediators;
SELECT id, name, email FROM mediators WHERE organization IS NOT NULL;

SELECT parties_involved.name, parties_involved.role, communication_logs.communication_date FROM parties_involved INNER JOIN communication_logs ON parties_involved.id = communication_logs.party_id WHERE parties_involved.role = 'Client';
SELECT mediators.name, communication_logs.communication_type, communication_logs.communication_details FROM mediators LEFT JOIN communication_logs ON mediators.id = communication_logs.mediator_id;
SELECT * FROM mediators WHERE phone LIKE '%555%' AND organization IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM mediators ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, role FROM parties_involved WHERE role = 'Lawyer';
SELECT id, name, email FROM mediators WHERE id > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT party_id FROM communication_logs WHERE mediator_id = 3;
SELECT id, timestamp, message FROM communication_logs WHERE party_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM mediators;
SELECT name, email FROM mediators WHERE name LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY id DESC;

SELECT p.name AS party_name, c.timestamp AS log_time, l.attachment_path AS attachment FROM parties_involved p JOIN communication_logs c ON p.id = c.party_id LEFT JOIN logs_attachments l ON c.id = l.log_id WHERE p.role = 'Client' ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT m.name AS mediator_name, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM mediators m JOIN communication_logs cl ON m.id = cl.mediator_id GROUP BY mediator_name HAVING total_logs > 5 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;

SELECT c.message AS log_message, pa.attachment_path AS attachment_path FROM communication_logs c LEFT JOIN logs_attachments pa ON c.id = pa.log_id WHERE c.message IS NOT NULL AND pa.attachment_path IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.timestamp ASC, pa.attachment_path DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediator;
SELECT name,email FROM party;
SELECT id,email,phone_number FROM mediator WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM communication_log ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT name,description FROM conflict WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM mediator WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM party WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, message, sent_at FROM communication_log WHERE party_id = 3 AND mediator_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM conflict WHERE description LIKE '%conflict%' ORDER BY started_at ASC;
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM mediator WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
